name: rareness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being very unusual and not at all common: The main attraction of this butterfly is its rareness. With the rareness of their son's disease, the family didn't feel they had much choice. See
rare
More examplesFewer examplesThis picture is one of her finest works and the rareness of her oeuvre has brought expectations of a record price.His shyness may explain the rareness of his appearances.The value of this data comes from its rareness or unexpectedness.
